mapper.update: update sendtplsms_result set tpl_id = #{tplId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpl_content = #{tplContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rrid = #{rrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select rrid, tpl_id, tpl_content, mobile, ext, stime, status, state, reason from sendtplsms_result
mapper.insert: insert into sendtplsms_result (select * from sendtplsms s where s.rrid = #{rrid}
